snippet: The Japanese Army set up the battery of interceptor missiles on the Defense Ministry grounds in Tokyo as the nation prepared for a possible North Korean missile test.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese Army set up the battery of interceptor missiles on the Defense Ministry grounds in Tokyo as the nation prepared for a possible North Korean missile test.

headline.seo: Japan Arms Tokyo Against North Korean Missiles
headline.main: Wary of North Korea, Japan Puts Missile Defense in Tokyo
headline.print_headline: Wary of North Korea, Japan Puts Missile Defense in Tokyo
